title: Occultist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player at night to add to your spirit list.
- Send a message to the Town in death (1 use).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players added to your spirit list will be able to post in the day chat on the day after they died. They will not have access to dead chat until the day is over. This does not apply to players that were lynched.
- If you die, your spirit list will be wiped.
- While dead, you may send the host a message (500-character limit) at night to announce to the Town upon the start of the next day.
